be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollaboratorTaskDatabase, ProjectCollaborationDatabase, ProjectDatabase, ProjectTagDatabase, TagDatabase, TaskDatabase, UserDatabase

    abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The database class. The class is used to handle the connection to the database.

        Checks if the database exists.
        Returns:
        true if the database file exists, false otherwise

        Returns:

      • connect

        protected static java.sql.Connection connect()
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Connect to the database.
        Returns:
        the Connection object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws when something wrong happens during the fetching of data from the database
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the DRIVER class is not found. It implies that the connection fails.

      • findLastInsertedRow

        protected static int findLastInsertedRow(java.lang.String table)
                                  throws ConnectionFailedException,
                                         DatabaseException
        Finds the id of the last inserted project (used in the above inserts).
        Parameters:
        table - the table in which we want to find the last inserted row
        Returns:
        The id of the last inserted project (used in the above inserts)
        Throws:
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
        DatabaseException - This exception is thrown to let the user know that there is a database failure

      • createNewDatabaseFile

        public static void createNewDatabaseFile(java.lang.String startPath)
                                  throws ConnectionFailedException,
                                         DatabaseException
        Creates a new database.
        Parameters:
        startPath - beginning of the path
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if a problem occurs during the access to the database
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • throwException

        public static void throwException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
                           throws DatabaseException
        Handles the exception when a query does not work well.
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception caught (mostly SQLException)
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - This exception is thrown to let the user know that there is a database failure

      • throwConnectionException

        public static void throwConnectionException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)

        Handles the exception when the connection to the database fails.
        Parameters:
        throwable - The exception caught (mostly SQLException)
        Throws:
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
